item.title: Moore Threads 计划将大部分 IPO 募集资金用于购买银行产品
item.description: 中国领先的人工智能芯片制造商摩尔芯科技股份有限公司计划将最近上市募集的大部分资金投入银行产品。【原文：Moore Threads Technology Co., a leading Chinese artificial intelligence chipmaker, plans to put most of the funds raised through its recent listing into banking products.】

item.title: 表决失败后，中国万科誓言改进债券延期计划
item.description: 陷入困境的开发商中国万科集团股份有限公司（China Vanke Co.【原文：Distressed developer China Vanke Co. said it would improve on plans to push back a looming bond payment after creditors balked at its initial proposal, raising the risk of default.】

item.title: 在人工智能的推动下，林吉特的优异表现将在明年延续
item.description: 马来西亚林吉特有望连续第二年跑赢亚洲同类货币，一些策略师预计这种超额收益将持续到 2026 年。【原文：The Malaysian ringgit is on course to beat its Asian peers for a second straight year, and some strategists are expecting the outperformance to extend into 2026.】

item.title: 伦敦公寓的实际价格在过去十年中下降了 22
item.description: 多年来，英国的年轻专业人士一直面临着一个两难的问题：最好的工作机会却在一个拥有世界上最昂贵房价的城市。【原文：For years, Britain’s young professionals have faced a dilemma: the best job opportunities are in a city that has some of the world’s most exorbitant house prices.】

item.title: 就业网站称，英国最低收入工人的工资增长正在降温
item.description: 新数据显示，由于就业市场恶化削弱了部分劳动力的议价能力，最低收入工人的工资增长开始放缓。【原文：Wage growth for the lowest-paid workers is starting to slow as a worsening jobs market undercuts the bargaining power of a section of the workforce that has proved resistant to the Bank of England’s inflation-fighting efforts, new data shows.】

item.title: 日本工厂景气改善，日本央行加息理由更加充分
item.description: 日本大型制造商的信心升至四年来的最高水平，增强了市场对日本央行本周加息的预期。【原文：Confidence among Japan’s large manufacturers rose to the highest level in four years, reinforcing market expectations for the Bank of Japan to raise interest rates this week.】

item.title: 美联储言论分歧缓和宽松前景，黄金保持涨势
item.description: 在美联储官员发表的相互矛盾的言论促使交易商抑制对美国明年进一步放宽货币政策的押注后，黄金在连续四天上涨后企稳。【原文：Gold steadied following four days of gains, after conflicting remarks from Federal Reserve officials prompted traders to curb bets on further monetary easing in the US next year.】

item.title: 石油保持两个月低位，盈余抵消地缘政治紧张局势
item.description: 由于对供应过剩的担忧超过了对地缘政治紧张局势加剧的担忧，石油价格稳定在近两个月来的最低水平附近。【原文：Oil was steady near the lowest level in almost two months as fears of a glut outweighed heightened geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 中国点心债券热潮持续升温，推动货币化雄心壮志
item.description: 离岸人民币债券的发行量再创新高，这是随着美元吸引力的减弱，中国政府在货币国际化方面取得进展的一个新迹象。【原文：Issuance of offshore yuan bonds rose to another record, a fresh sign of Beijing’s progress on internationalizing its currency as the dollar’s appeal weakens.】

item.title: 福特斯库收购秘鲁勘探者公司，进军铜矿领域
item.description: Fortescue Ltd. 已同意收购总部位于加拿大的勘探公司 Alta Copper Corp.【原文：Fortescue Ltd. has agreed to acquire Canada-based explorer Alta Copper Corp. in a deal that marks the Australian company’s first major foray beyond iron ore into other metals.】

item.title: 关于华纳兄弟与 Netflix 协议的五点误解
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普尚未决定由谁收购华纳兄弟公司【原文：Donald Trump doesn’t decide who gets to buy Warner Bros. -- yet】

item.title: 全球基金认为印度股票是抵御人工智能风险的最佳对冲工具
item.description: 随着对人工智能泡沫的担忧日益加剧，印度正在吸引全球基金经理的新关注，他们希望在未来一年里实现股票投资的多元化。【原文：India is drawing fresh attention from global fund managers looking to diversify equity investments in the coming year as worries over an AI bubble mount.】

item.title: 朝日公司首席执行官考虑成立新的网络安全部门，以应对持续不断的破坏活动
item.description: 朝日集团控股有限公司（Asahi Group Holdings Ltd.）正在考虑建立一个新的网络安全团队，因为 9 月份的勒索软件攻击对公司运营和财务报告造成的破坏预计将持续到新的一年。【原文：Asahi Group Holdings Ltd. is considering to create a new cybersecurity team after disruptions to operations and financial reporting from a September ransomware attack are expected to continue into the new year.】

item.title: 澳大利亚证券交易所面临 1.5 亿澳元的资本支出和监管改革
item.description: 澳大利亚企业监管机构将对澳大利亚证券交易所有限公司（ASX Ltd.）征收 1.5 亿澳元（约合 9,960 万美元）的资本费用，这是在对陷入困境的交易所运营商进行持续调查之际为保护该国金融市场而采取的一揽子措施的一部分。【原文：Australia’s corporate regulator will impose a A$150 million ($99.6 million) capital charge on ASX Ltd. as part of a package to safeguard the nation’s financial markets amid an ongoing probe into the embattled exchange operator.】

item.title: 科技股担忧加剧，亚洲股市注定下跌：市场综述
item.description: 由于人们对科技公司盈利前景的担忧日益加剧，削弱了风险情绪，亚洲市场将以疲软开盘。【原文：Asian markets are poised for a weak open as mounting concern over the earnings outlook for technology companies saps risk sentiment.】

item.title: 对移民和犯罪的担忧推动智利在总统选举中向右倾斜
item.description: 周日，极端保守派人士何塞-安东尼奥-卡斯特（José Antonio Kast）在对犯罪和失控移民日益增长的担忧的推动下，果断当选为智利总统。【原文：Ultra-conservative José Antonio Kast was decisively elected Chile’s president Sunday, driven by growing fears of crime and uncontrolled migration — making it the latest Latin America nation to take a hard turn to the right.】

item.title: 关于美联储 2026 年走向的债券市场辩论即将升温
item.description: 随着一系列关键经济数据的公布，美国国债市场关于美联储未来降息幅度的大讨论即将升温。【原文：The big debate in the US Treasury market over the extent of Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts ahead is about to heat up with a string of pivotal economic data releases.】

item.title: 据说 SK Capital 接近达成收购瑞士药品分销商 Swixx 的交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，美国私募股权公司 SK Capital Partners 即将达成收购瑞士药品分销公司 Swixx Biopharma SA 的交易。【原文：US private equity firm SK Capital Partners is nearing a deal to acquire Swiss drug distribution company Swixx Biopharma SA, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 法国寻求推迟欧盟对南美贸易协定的投票
item.description: 法国正在寻求推迟欧盟定于本周就与南美一些最大经济体达成的自由贸易协定进行的投票，称保护欧盟农民和消费者的措施还不够充分。【原文：France is seeking to delay a European Union vote scheduled for this week on a free-trade agreement with some of the largest South American economies, saying that measures to protect the bloc’s farmers and consumers are insufficient.】

item.title: 哈塞特称特朗普可就美联储政策自由发表意见
item.description: 国家经济委员会主任凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）表示，如果他被选中领导美联储，他将考虑唐纳德-特朗普总统的政策意见，但央行的利率决策仍将保持独立。【原文：National Economic Council head Kevin Hassett said he’d consider President Donald Trump’s policy opinions if picked to lead the Federal Reserve, but that the central bank’s interest rate decisions would remain independent.】

item.title: 东京燃气将投资美国下游资产以推动增长
item.description: 日本最大的燃料分销商东京燃气公司计划投资美国下游资产，以提高收益并加强其能源供应链的最后一环。【原文：Tokyo Gas Co., Japan’s biggest distributor of the fuel, plans to invest in US downstream assets to lift earnings and reinforce the last leg of its energy supply chain.】

item.title: 米莱降低关税，中国购买稀有阿根廷小麦货物
item.description: 阿根廷潘帕斯草原的农民们正在收获创纪录的小麦，哈维尔-米莱伊总统也正在降低装运小麦的关税，以促进出口，在这样的时刻，中国购买了几十年来第一批阿根廷小麦。【原文：China is buying its first cargo of Argentine wheat in decades at a time when farmers on the Pampas are harvesting a record crop and President Javier Milei is trimming tariffs on shipments in a bid to boost exports.】

item.title: SpaceX 估值飙升，Alphabet 将再获纸面收益
item.description: 在太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）完成要约收购之后，Alphabet 公司又将获得一笔可观的票据收益，该要约收购对这家控股公司的实际估值约为 8000 亿美元。【原文：Alphabet Inc. is set to book another sizable paper gain after SpaceX completes a tender offer that effectively values the closely held company at about $800 billion.】

item.title: 华尔街看到人工智能泡沫正在形成，并正在博弈如何戳破它
item.description: 自 OpenAI 发布 ChatGPT 引发人工智能热潮以来，三年过去了。尽管资金仍在源源不断地涌入，但人们对好景是否能持续也心存疑虑。【原文：It’s been three years since OpenAI set off euphoria over artificial intelligence with the release of ChatGPT. And while the money is still pouring in, so are the doubts about whether the good times can last.】

item.title: 套利交易的复苏带动新兴市场的复苏，激发对 2026 年的乐观预期
item.description: 大型投资者表示，新兴市场的利差交易在 2026 年还将继续，而这一年是这一流行策略的大丰收之年。【原文：Big investors say that carry trades across emerging markets have further to run in 2026 following a blockbuster year for the popular strategy.】

item.title: 智利举行总统决选，右翼势力有望夺权
item.description: 智利人将在周日的总统决选中投票，预计这将为拉丁美洲最繁荣的国家之一开创一个强硬右翼政治的新时代。【原文：Chileans are voting in Sunday’s presidential runoff that’s expected to usher in a new era of hard-right politics in one of Latin America’s most prosperous nations.】

item.title: 广告公司股有望将人工智能颠覆性技术转化为自身优势
item.description: 2025 年股市的一个重要主题是那些可能因人工智能进步而蒙受损失的股票的下滑，其中最主要的是广告公司。【原文：A key stock-market theme of 2025 has been the slide in shares that stand to lose out from advances in artificial intelligence, chief among them being advertising agencies.】

item.title: 印度加强新德里污染控制，停止建筑施工
item.description: 在空气中的毒素突然激增之后，印度加强了对新德里及附近地区的污染控制。【原文：India stepped up anti-pollution curbs in New Delhi and nearby areas after a sudden spike in airborne toxins.】

item.title: 英国最具影响力智囊团背后的 "破烂变财富 "资本家
item.description: 克莱夫-考德利可以说是当今英国政坛最具影响力的非政治家。他在 20 年前创立的智库 Resolution Foundation 的弟子们如今在威斯敏斯特的大厅里工作，工党政府部长们的头脑中也充满了他的思想。【原文：Clive Cowdery is arguably the most influential non-politician in UK politics today. His proteges at the Resolution Foundation, a think tank he founded 20 years ago, now staff the halls of Westminster and its ideas occupy the minds of Labour’s government ministers.】

item.title: 调查显示：大选在即，泰国总理支持率下降
item.description: 一项民意调查显示，在距离大选不到两个月的时间里，泰国总理阿努丁-差威拉库尔的支持率进一步下降，落后于反对党领袖。【原文：Thai Prime Minister Anutin Charnvirakul’s popularity has dropped further behind the leader of an opposition party, an opinion poll shows, with general elections less than two months away.】
